# Requirements (Work)

> **Note:** This extends the base template from `shared/code/templates/docs/requirements.md`
> 
> See [shared/code/templates/docs/requirements.md](../../../../shared/code/templates/docs/requirements.md) for the full template.

## Work-Specific Requirements

For work projects, requirements must include:
- **Compliance requirements** - Regulatory and policy obligations
- **Security requirements** - Authentication, authorization, encryption
- **Audit requirements** - What must be logged and retained
- **Data requirements** - Classification, retention, disposal
- **Change management** - Approval gates and deployment windows
- **Testing requirements** - Security testing, compliance validation
